welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cimanggis, Indonesia! This charming city is known for its beautiful natural scenery, vibrant culture, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Cimanggis has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
